item.title: go private package import and config
item.description: 常常忘記要怎麼設定 官方FAQ: https://go.dev/doc/faq#git_https 設定 ~/.netrc machine github.com login $USERNAME password $TOKEN 設定 ~/.gitconfig [url "ssh://git@github.com/"] insteadOf = https://github.com/

item.title: Hugo With Github Actions
item.description: 簡單記錄一下 我是採用不同兩個repo的方式 一個repo放整份code 另一份則是單純hugo輸出的靜態網頁, 並放在前一份repo的public底下作為submodule name: github-pages-deploy on: push: branches: [ master ] jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-18.04 steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v2 with: submodules: true fetch-depth: 0 - name: checkout uses: actions/checkout@v2 with: repository: your_username/your_username.github.io # 需要先去個人的Settings->Developer settings->Personal access tokens申請, # 然後再到這個專案的Settings->Secrets新增 token: ${{ secrets.DEPLOY_TO_GITHUB_PAGE_TOKEN }} path: public - name: Setup Hugo uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v2 with: hugo-version: 'latest' extended: true - name: Build run: hugo --minify - name: deploy and publish updates working-directory: .
